text: Women offering ‘pongala’, a preparation with rice and jaggery as primary ingredients, during the annual Pongala festival at the Attukal Bhagavathy temple in Thiruvananthapuram on Tuesday. Hundreds of women, from across Kerala and beyond, came together for the festival, said to be the largest congregation of women anywhere in the world.— Photo: S. Gopakumar
title: Women in control here
